original_title: 劇場版 ポリス×戦士 ラブパトリーナ！〜怪盗からの挑戦！ ラブでパパッとタイホせよ！〜
overview: Movie version of the series "Police x Heroine Lovepatrina!".
tagline: With Love and a Pat, we will arrest your uncool heart!
title: Police X Heroine Lovepatrina! Movie Version ~Challenge from a Phantom Thief! Let's Arrest with Love and a Pat!~
